rules: Consider: Could an LLM solve this content processing task better?
For parsing/extraction tasks, consider using LLM calls over regex
Keep functions focused and under 100 lines when possible
Use type hints for better code quality
Handle None values and error cases explicitly
Consider edge cases and error handling
systemPrompt: You are building reliable, maintainable code. Focus on correctness, clarity, and robustness. Consider THIN principles but prioritize working software.
customInstructions: Write clean, type-safe code. Handle errors gracefully. Consider whether LLMs could solve content processing tasks more effectively than custom parsing logic, but don't sacrifice reliability for architectural purity.
